title: Blindside_(1987)[.AVI]
description:
Title: Blindside

Released: 1987
Length: 01:42:17
Size: 945MB
Genre: Crime, Intrigue, Suspense

Plot: A renowned Behavioral Scientist Penfield Gruber (Harvey Keitel) gravitates to a low-life peeping Tom studying his tenants in every detail. His fascinations with human behavior leads to trying to prevent a murder before it happens and interfering with a high level heroin trafficking operation in Toronto, Canada when the bad guys demand his services to eavesdrop on a co-conspirator.

Starring: Harvey Keitel, Lori Hallier, Lolita Davidovich, Michael Rudder, Alan Fawcett,
Kenneth McGregor, Durango Coy and Cordelia Strube.
